A quick question:

For a while I was partially GMing much of the background=
 information 
and characters, especially when it was just me and Airly. Rec=
ently I 
have been scaling back the number of characters I control and the =

amount of background stuff I have been running. But at the same time I 
am=
 noting that stuff is slowing again. 

Did you want me to continue running =
background stuff, or should I back 
off? I must admit though, that this par=
ticular theme is confining.
